OBJECTIVE
To join an organization that will recognize and utilize my skills fully and offer me a
position requiring innovative and creative ideas where continuous growth and learning are a way to
life.
WORK EXPERIENCE
GULF EXPERIENCE
COMPANY      : AGGREKO MIDDLE EAST, DUBAI
Designation
   : Electrical Site Engineer
Duration
   : From March 2012 to December 2016.
April  2012  to  October  2012  60  MW  Diesel  power  plant  commissioning  and
operation. At mudaybi, Oman.    
January 2013 to December 2014 15 MW Diesel power plant commissioning and 
operation. At SOC, Iraq.
January 2015 to February 2016 45 MW Diesel power plant commissioning and
operation. At EDZ, Lebanon.
 March 2016 to July 2016 as a 40 MW Diesel Power plant commissioning and
operation. At GPA, Guam, USA.
August 2016 to December 2016 Commissioning and Maintains in Kuwait depot.    
MY RESPONSIBILITIES:
Maintain and repair Aggreko electrical equipment as per Aggreko Service Manual and
Original Equipment Manufacturer's recommendations.
Maintain high standards of house-keeping through out the site.
 AAP2 certified.
Compliance and promote with company QHSE policy.
An awareness of accident reporting procedures.
Completion of site reports, shift reports, logs and associated documentation.
Ensure all electrical and electronic measuring devices have valid test documents.
Produce the necessary plant service schedules, service reports and component change
documentation. Timely completion of all required documentation.
Detailed fault analysis & reporting and electrical incident reporting.
Basic Operation and Maintenance skills of Aggreko equipment.
Proactively takes part in site improvement plans.
